description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. CEPINAS is a sci-fi Space Shooter / Strategy game. Conquer planets with the "CONQ" weapon, defend them against the aggressive invanders and become the new emperor of the universe. Choose wisely your path to victory, become a unstoppable one man Army or make your conquered planets to self-defending battlestations.
description.short: CEPINAS is a sci-fi Space Shooter / Strategy game. Conquer planets with the "CONQ" weapon, defend them against the aggressive invanders and become the new emperor of the universe. Choose wisely your path to victory, become a unstoppable one man Army or make your conquered planets to self-defending battlestations.
